item.title: Mozilla/whisperfile · Hugging Face
item.description: The model is packaged into executable weights, which we call whisperfiles. This makes it easy to use the model on Linux, MacOS, Windows, FreeBSD, OpenBSD, and NetBSD for AMD64 and ARM64. Running the following on a desktop OS will transcribe the speech of a wav file into colorful text.
